name: Star Dreams
description:
A short 2D game for the GE Jame #3 game jam.

The theme is/was Duality.

This is my first game, but I hope you will still kinda enjoy it!

Please feel free to share feedback! :)

---

Controls:

MoveWASDArrow KeysController (Left Joystick)JumpSpaceArrow UpController (X/A)Camera MovementPress and Hold Mouse3 (Middle mouse button)Press and Hold Mouse3 (Middle mouse button)N/A

The game supports multiple languages!
